org.spleen.tool

Class SizeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spleen.tool.SizeConverter

  • public class SizeConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    SizeConverter tool class. SizeConverter is a tool class that provide easy size convertion between human readable size and byte.
    Author:
    vallance
